entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mono builds failing with file not found error #103677
  • browser-wasm LibraryTests timing out #103674
  • Arm64/Sve cleanup: Use `gtNewSimdCvtMaskToVectorNode` from gtFoldExprHWIntrinsic instead of importer #103672
  • Extend System.Guid with a new creation API for v7 #103658
    9.0.0
  • Issue with COM Interop in VB6 After Migrating from .NET 4.8 to .NET 8 #103656
  • Is the locking in ReflectionComposablePart correct? #103650
  • CurrencyNegativePattern is set to 1(instead of 0) when getting "en-US" culture in .NET 8. #103644
  • [WPF] System.Management 8.0.0 - Scrolling using stylus does not work anymore when using ManagementClass.GetInstances() #103640
  • System.IO.Tests.Directory_Create_Tests.FileSystemWatcher_Directory_Create_InNestedDirectory fails with "Created event did not occur as expected" #103630
  • [ios-8.0/9.0] Cannot compile project with AOT enabled (Assertion at mini-llvm.c, condition `cinfo->ret.nslots == 1' not met) #103628
  • Current status of .NET support on HarmonyOS platform #103627
  • [browser][publish] Windows has problems with AOT build/publish for long paths #103625
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 7 Regressions on 6/15/2024 2:08:36 PM #103652
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 26 Regressions on 6/14/2024 3:42:32 AM #103653
  • Test failure: CoreMangLib/system/span/RefStructWithSpan/RefStructWithSpan.cmd #103624
  • [wasm] System.Security.Cryptography.Tests: Unable to evaluate script: tab crashed #103623
  • Tensor<T> and supporting types, part 2 #103611
    9.0.0

Closed

  • `OrderedDictionary.SetAt` bug #103637
    9.0.0
  • CecilPackageVersionMatchesAssemblyVersion failing #103563
  • Ability to obsolete `IEnumerable.GetEnumerator` used through Linq #103664
  • Arm64/Sve: AV in GatherLoad* APIs #103606
  • Arm64: Rename AdvSimd/Sve Load/Store vector API names #102340
    9.0.0
  • net7.0-ios16.1 depends on non-existent Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Ref 7.0.20 #102214
  • Crash in DoStackSnapshot. #95167
    9.0.0
  • Proposal: use ValueTask<TItem> in CacheExtensions.GetOrCreateAsync #103666
  • Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable does not support setting empty values #50554
    Future
  • 'ProcessStartInfo.EnvironmentVariables ["FOO"] = null' launches with empty environment variable #34446
    Future
  • Unable to debug crash dump created on machine using Ubuntu 22.04 feed runtime. #103377
    9.0.0
  • XDocument.Load fails with certain Unicode characters (U+E039) #103532
  • IBinaryInteger<BigInteger>.GetShortestBitLength() - int overflow is not handled #84670
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.DynamicChainTests.PolicyConstraints_Valid #103615
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Vector3Tests.Vector3LerpTest1 on arm64 #103568
  • AdvSimd: Invalid "The constant does not fit within the value bounds of '0' to '15'" warning #103556
  • Test failure: System.Numerics.Tests.Vector3Tests.Vector3MultiplyOperatorTest #103544
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Move the default property settings that were used to build the runtime pack, to `wasm-props.json` included in the runtime pack #91628
    9.0.0
  • AllSubsets_Mono_Minijit_RuntimeTests minijit fails to build with "Could not copy the file hostfxr.dll.pdb because it was not found" #103642
  • [6.0] Error 12175 calling WINHTTP_CALLBACK_STATUS_REQUEST_ERROR, 'A security error occurred' #95155
    9.0.0
  • any limitations on EventCounters on Linux? #102629
    9.0.0
  • Unoptimal codegen for "obj is T" with T being struct/sealed #36649
    Future
  • Consider switching to LLVM libunwind #4193
  • [API Proposal]: Add API to detect Binary Format (MS-NRBF) header #84090
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] WinHttpHandler #56957
    Future
  • [wasm][chrome] Unable to evaluate script: disconnected: unable to send message to renderer #103061
  • Wasm test failure: Unable to evaluate script: target frame detached #102957
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Clone for IncrementalHash and KMAC #103170
    9.0.0
  • [iOS/HybridGlobalization] No space between time and AM/PM designator #102250
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] map `QuicException` to `OCE` in case of a cancellation #98220
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690.cmd #103613
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690.cmd #103614
  • mac m1 build failure #92860
  • Initialize Job - ComponentGovernanceComponentDetection - Unable to locate dotnet on build agent, tool failed to execute #90716
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 28 Regressions on 7/18/2023 1:13:00 AM #89259
  • [7.0] jit-dasm failed with error MSB3971 #95161
  • Component governance failing on musl legs of servicing branches #85492
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 7 Regressions on 5/12/2023 4:02:48 AM #87180
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 29 Regressions on 1/27/2023 11:43:56 PM #81549
  • Support running perf benchmarks from `dotnet/performance` on a PR, and compare with a baseline #76533
  • [release/6.0] CI failure: Banana RID not found in dev-innerloop (sourcebuild) #78197
  • [Build] Console output lost #97211
  • error C3611: 'System::Numerics::INumberBase::System::IUtf8SpanFormattable.Try Format': a sealed function cannot have a pure-specifier #97036
  • Dead lettering tests #101524
  • AOT warnings reported on partial classes #102893

PullRequests

Created

  • Generalize IControlFlowGraph successors #103676
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ReciprocalEstimate`, `ReciprocalExponent`, `ReciprocalSqrtEstimate`, `ReciprocalSqrtStep`, and `ReciprocalStep` #103673
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Handle possible null in SerialStream.Dispose() on Windows #103671
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use Stream.CopyTo{Async} in NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.Append{Async} #103669
    area-System.IO
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetNestedExceptionData #103668
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Consistently report unresolved members in illink #103667
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `Scale` and `Sqrt` #103663
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Find all generic interface impls #103661
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix locking in ReflectionComposablePart.ImportsCache #103660
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Whitespaces in LazyThreadSafetyMode.cs comments #103659
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add notes for NativeAOT specific warnings in ExpectedWarningAttributes #103657
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [Logging.EventSource] Add trace correlation fields #103655
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Have COND_JUMP handling check for gtEffectiveVal #103649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • call gtFoldExpr after fgMorphExpandInstanceField #103648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HybridGlobalization]Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103647
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • CI test #103646
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add IList<T> and related APIs to JsonObject. #103645
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • bump npm dependencies and lock file format #103639
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Rename StoreVectorMxNAndZip to StoreVectorAndZip #103638
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] change StartsWithPayloadHeader to accept a Span rather than array #103636
    new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix missing 'RelativePath' metadata in items produced by AOT compiler #103633
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NRBF] Reject orphaned records and invalid references #103632
    binary-serialization, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Increase timeout for superpmi-diffs job #103631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Remove all XunitShowProgress=true #103621
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix print when outputting disasm #103618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Base64Url support for netstandard 2.0 #103617
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • `InlineArray`'s `Equals` and `GetHashCode` throw #103612
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix missing hashcode set in OrderedDictionary.SetAt #103643
    area-System.Collections
  • Remove cecil version check #103665
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Arm64/Sve: Remove unwanted insScalableOpts and instructions #103620
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: GatherVectorWithByteOffsets #103564
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Arm AdvSimd: Rename LoadVector128xN to LoadNxVector128 #103626
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Disable ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds on Windows #103651
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Support environment variables with empty value #103551
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use Type.GetProperty/GetField instead of GetMember. #103275
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add System.Formats.Nrbf to the windowsdesktop transport package #103629
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `RoundAwayFromZero`, `RoundToNearest`, `RouteToNegativeInfininty`, `RoundToPositiveInfinity`, `RoundToZero` #103588
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface.GetThreadData #103324
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix 103544 and 103556 #103590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Move hardcoded `_BoolPropertiesThatTriggerRelinking` to `wasm-props.json` included in the runtime pack #103422
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Add exists condition for copying hostfxr & hostpolicy symbol files #103641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Swift calling convention #103570
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Update riscv64 CI image #103616
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Classify stack arguments as single segment #103619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Produce less convoluted IR for boolean `isinst` checks #103391
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Add platform guard to `IsSupported` #103342
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add support for SwiftSelf<T> in Swift calling convention #103576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HybridGlobalization] Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103226
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-browser
  • JIT: Fix `resolveConflictingDefAndUse` to take kills into account #103562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clone for IncrementalHash and KMAC #103479
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0
  • JitDump: RefPosition::getRegisterType() for RegTypeKill segfaults #103573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Wrap Cancelled Request with OCE instead of QuicException #103081
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix DAC getting alloc context for thread #103610
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Test old block layout in outerloop pipelines #103608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, avx512
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Create portable box helper and wrap the thread-local alloc context in a struct #103607
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow GC on the first instruction of NoGC region (except in prologs/epilogs) #103540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix 2 issues when triggering a garbage collection via EventPipe #102612
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2476839 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Additional cleanup and acceleration of the System.Numerics vector and related types #103527
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix handling SECBUFFER_EXTRA with renegotiation after handshake. #103419
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Arm64: Shuffle(v, [2, 3, 0, 1]) -> ext_64 v,v,1 #103598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Default DynamicCodeSupport to true for CoreCLR #103594
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update EOL versions (main) #103379
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fixing API to use in and ReadOnly as needed #103368
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Gauge Metrics Instrument #103543
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Expose the useful constant values in TimeSpan #103498
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ConvertToint64` and `ConvertToUInt64` #103502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Avoid check for returns in methods with pinvokes in LSRA #103559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport fix for MethodImpl removal when interfaceImpl is removed #103432
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [Android] Allow using installed certificates for client authentication in SslStream #103337
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics and add run-time check #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #103599
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, javascript
  • JIT: Clean up `RefPosition` "killed registers" storage #103560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [8.0] Disable for August the OOB packages enabled in July #103597
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use new ABI classifiers for `GenTreeCall` arguments #103537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable nullable for HostFactoryResolver.Tests #103609
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove the LLVMSharp dependency #2615
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can SnapshottingCollection.GetSnapshot() call CreateSnapshot() multiple times? #41663
  • Bug when handling Boolean values within Native -> C# callbacks #41662
  • Develop process to validate SDK does not include any vulnerable components #41659
    Backlog
  • dotnet new command, for project templates, behaves differently between macOS and Linux (Ubuntu) #41644

Closed

  • Dotnet list solution.sln package fails in sdk 8.0.101 #38634
  • Info produced by `dotnet -?` about `dotnet help` is inaccurate. It says the command "Show command line help" rather than show online documentation in browser #41173
  • _NetFrameworkHostedCompilersVersion is empty in Microsoft.NETCoreSdk.BundledVersions.props in 9.0-preview5 #41652
  • [BUG] 'To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: maui-android', but the workload is already installed #37706
  • Display appropriate error message when providing syntactically incorrect MSBUILD flags to dotnet pack #38645
  • DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT through csproj #38646
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 preview 6 sdk installed, create blazorwasm project failed with error "Could not resolve SDK "Microsoft.NET.Runtime.Emscripten.Python.${NetVersion}". Exactly one of the probing messages bel..." #41538

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixup SDK build #41664
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning when targeting net standard less then 2.0 #41660
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add testFullMSBuild env var to the test step #41656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update CentOS tags in 8.0.4xx #40212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet help command description #41569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean-up Update sdk-build.yml #41655
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds metadata to JS initializers and JS modules #41629
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix newline bug when updating exclusion baseline #41640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use correct property for _NetFrameworkHostedCompilersVersion in GenerateBundledVersions.targets #41653
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update CentOS tags in 8.0.3xx #40216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update CentOS tags in 8.0.1xx #40211
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update CentOS tags in 6.0.1xx #40210
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update CentOS tags in 6.0.4xx #40209
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog
  • Open issues: Breaking changes #7918

PullRequests

Updated

  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #8220

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move static members has incorrect formatting after moving to nested type #74054
    Backlog
  • Remove IBuiltInAnalyzer.OpenFileOnly #74048
  • False positive CS4007 "Instance of type 'System.ReadOnlySpan<Buffer10<int>>' cannot be preserved across 'await' or 'yield' boundary" #74046
  • C# interactive window does not open after the last Visual Studio Community 2022 Update #74047
  • Use target-typed new for all elements in an array or a list #74040
  • .AsIncrementalGenerator extension method #74039

Closed

  • CSharpMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider #66734
    17.11
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35017.309 #74045
  • Roslyn JSON detection marks strings as JSON even if StringSyntaxAttribute says it's not. #74020
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Verify that HostAnalysisScope is only ever used in the context of a single analyzer #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Ide options #74053
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve trivia for 'Use Collection Expression' fixer in more cases #74052
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add type hints for collection expressions #74051
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid span conversion in delegate extension receiver #74044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Remove fallbacks1 #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add fallback options to solution snapshot #74038
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix move static members when destination is in the same file #74037
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2476719 #74050
    auto-merge
  • Do not treat text as json when passed to api that explicit says it is not #74019
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add brokered service for Hot Reload in VS Code: GenericHotReloadAgentManagerService #74029
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Emit extension marker method as public #73994
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Expose 5 more things to Razor cohosting #73781
    Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74056
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Disable targeted notifications in integration tests #73987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add a cancellation on typing for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure an empty run result doesn't throw when generators are present. #74034
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #74024
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Update to .NET 9 Preview 5 #74028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add LanguageServer.Protocol.Test.Utilities.csproj #74036
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dictionary property causes build crash when generating OpenAPI document at build time #56307
  • When calling httpclient in injecting func #56306
  • Support options for setting callback used to generated reference IDs in OpenAPI #56305
  • SignalR eats JSON serialization exceptions during streaming responses #56303
  • How to send a Microsoft Identity Platform sign in request? #56302

    9.0-preview7

    9.0-preview7

    9.0-preview7
  • Blazor web app auto mode stop working some times. #56282
  • Cannot create a `blazorwasm` template project with name including emoji #56277

Closed

    9.0-preview7
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #56285

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip Templates.Mvc.Tests in Helix on Debian12 and Mariner #56291

Merged

  • Use exact runtime for non-servicing builds of Blazor DevServer #56278

  • Skip SpotBugs for now #56297

  • Improve doc in IAuthenticationHandler #56196
    area-networking, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Fix ProjectTemplate build steps with new JDK #56199

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606

  • Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore to 6.6.2 #56266

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grid With Multiple Columns and Rows Does Not Properly Calculate Contents of * Row With Vertical Options Center/End #23125
  • iOS - CollectionView with varying row heights only gives one row of height per item until something triggers a refresh #23123
  • A Brush of type RadialGradientBrush to the Background property of an ImageButton doesn't show correctly #23119
    Backlog
  • Calling Focus() on an Entry befor it has been displayed causes ClearButton to be displayed permanently #23112
    Backlog
  • Detecting Un-Known license package "Vulcan.Maui.Template" while scanning MAUI project in Black Duck #23111
  • Confirmation box cannot open in Mac Catalyst #23110
  • CollectionView does not scroll horizontal #23109
    Backlog
  • [.NET 9.0 Preview 5] Build error when SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls.Compatibility is added to a project #23108
    9.0-preview6
  • Navigating to a page with collectionview and carousel view is too slow， and the page transitions are not smooth. #23107
    Backlog

Closed

  • ListView does not layout properly inside grid with mix of Auto and * columns and rows on Android #23122
  • [iOS] TabBar Icons not showing when using FontIconSource for Tab.Icon #10350
    Backlog
  • Project MAUI Title Color white and MenuItem icon color in black insteed of white #8355
  • Layout incorrect using a horizontal linear layout inside a grid #7703
  • flyoutitem shellcontent refreshing only once. If you click it on it again, it pretty much loads from cache #9224
  • Borders border looks unsharp and thickness varies across platforms #18705
  • NavigationPage.ToolbarItems not shown on Android after Back key pressed #15096
  • VS 2022, emulated device, Debug vs Release #22825
  • Please have a look at this issue https://github.com/CommunityToolkit/Maui/issues/1931 and how that can be solved. Looks like this fix does some strange things when the Unloaded event is not set on the page and Loaded is. #23080
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Image Loaded event not firing in 8.0.60 version which is used to fire in 8.0.40 and earlier versions. Selected 8.0.40 I am unable to see 8.0.60 #23058
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Android : Maui rc-1 crash on android #17697
    Backlog
  • MAUI template issues for projects with tricky characters such as '&' #23104
  • TapGestureRecognizer disregards parent's IsEnabled status on iOS and Catalyst. #18995
    Backlog
  • Android app throwing Exception_WasThrown Java.Security.GeneralSecurityException #23106
  • [iOS] NRE after calling ViewCell.ForceUpdateSize #23092
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Label LineHeight not working and multiline issues #7618
  • VerticalOptions cannot be set on a Rectangle in Windows #7573
  • Setting IsClippedToBounds to false doesn't appear to work on WinUI #8766
  • Shell Search leaves screen darkened after navigation #13813
  • [Android] - Opacity property not working properly at initial loading time for Frame and ListView control #13811
  • StrokeDashArray of border control only works with StrokeDashOffset != 0 #14938
  • [Android] ContentView measures content even if its IsVisible is set to False #14683
  • ContentProperty leads to XamlC error XFC0009 while compiling #15061
  • [WinUI] Border inside ScrollView not expanding during resize #17502
  • Entry's SelectionLength property is not updating initially on Android, Mac and iOS platforms. #17657
  • [Android] Images from URLs are not rendered if you do not specify a fixed size #17651
  • {Binding .} doesn't work in release mode #22945
    Backlog
  • Building MAUI projects with certain Unicode characters in the name result in failure to find Android and Windows manifests #21091

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23126
  • Use correct interface type in FrameRenderer #23124
  • Bump to Android 34.0.113 #23120
    area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Android Ecosystem version bumps #23117
  • Split bindings source generated code into multiple files #23116

Merged

  • Merge release/8.x-sr6 into main #23121
  • [Tests] Update to Appium 5.0.0 #23118
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [iOS] TapGestureRecognizer should not fire when view is not enabled #23049
    .NET 8 SR7
  • Make sure the view is still alive after posting #23114
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Fix loaded so it fires on second subscription #23095
  • Fix animated gifs in Release builds #22874
    area-image
  • [NativeAOT] Fix CarouselViewUITests #23113
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing
  • [iOS] Fixed NRE after calling ViewCell.ForceUpdateSize #23094
    community ✨
  • Remove old Compatibility Appium test projects #23098
  • Add additional logging for PopLifeCycle #23103
  • [SR6] Update arcade and xharness (#22981) #23100

Updated

  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui templates #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] FilePicker picking multiple files is very slow because of `FutureAccessList` use #23047
    community ✨
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    community ✨
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783

    area-core-platform
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052

  • Fixes #22914 #22917

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Memory Leak - Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.ServiceProviderCache #34028
  • Cosmos: Implement proper entity equality and contains logic for owned (and complex) types #34027
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Advanced type mapping inference (for scalar collections) #34026
    9.0.0
  • Translation of `TimeOnly.FromTimeSpan` on SQL Server should be no-op. #34025
    Backlog
  • Is it possible to "mark" given nullable field as indistinctive for nulls? #34024
  • The Cosmos provider ignores configured indexes #34023
  • The Cosmos type mapping source is too permissive #34022
  • Cosmos: support for mapping ReadOnlyMemory and/or similar #34021
  • Aggregate of count on a nested table (one to many relationship) throws an exception #34020
  • EF Core 8 Cannot Join to List or Use 'Contains' in Where Clause #34018
  • Package manager console don't show PM> #34017
  • Error I get an error when creating migration #34016

Closed

  • Using A ChangeTrackingStrategy with Many-To-Many Relationships #34015

PullRequests

Merged

  • Improve some null-related tests #34019

Updated

  • Fix `Nullable<T>.ToString()` #34014
  • Simplify `COALESCE` based on the nullability of its arguments #33938
  • Optimize away Coalesce for trivial cases #34002
  • Fix `Nullable<bool>.ToString()` conversion #33940
  • Cosmos querying over arrays of structural type #33998
  • Cosmos: Implement SelectMany #34013
  • Generate Accessors for shadow properties and columns #33996
